title: I made an online, interactive TFT cheatsheet
body:
https://tftcheatsheet.com/#cheatsheet

So one issue I was having with JPG cheatsheets was that it was hard to find multiple icons during the game. I made this because it's way easier for me to find champs. 

For example, you can search for a champ name and immediately see all the heroes who synergize with that champ. Also try clicking on say, multiple champs in a row.

Right now this does not have the items in it. I'm working on adding that, perhaps in a ^ formation (like an L shape but rotated 45 degrees).

Anyway, please let me know on what I can improve on!

replies.body: The only thing that it needs is the items and it's perfect

Yep, I'm working on it. I'm imagining it having a feature where you click on the 2nd tier item and it'll highlight the two items needed for it. It's super different from the hero synergies though so I can't leverage code from it
No... it's secured by an https certificate by Amazon. But I understand your concern. Here's a pic of it https://imgur.com/gallery/jMjAv9q
Thank you! I worked really hard on this. I'm glad that at least a few people like this. It's a bit of a relief that it wasn't wasted effort lol
Thank you! Means a lot to me.

https://underlordscheatsheet.com/

Soooo is this the same person or just Lifted?
Well, I link to it. It's also mine.

This looks cool and has some useful info for new players, but I just don't see how this should be used while in game. 
I have this spreadsheet https://i.imgur.com/91Qzapz.png[/img] that shows more information, fits on half a screen, and I don't need to tab out to klick some icons to know what they snyergize with.
